6.1.20  7:10 pm   Why is a week invariably 7 days? Months are based on the moon, years are based on the sun, and decades, centuries and millennia are based on our decimal system. What's so special about 7 days? 

      maybe it's supposed to be a quarter moon. that would actually be a closer fit than the months being based on the moon

      how has it gone so far? if you have never done it, then try it first and then let me know if you have any trouble

6.1.20  5:50 pm   Do you have to think about what to reply to these questions or do you answer with the first thing that comes to mind? It all seems very.. thoughtul!

      so far in these questions i have used my mind every different amount, and also at many different angles

6.1.20  5:47 pm   Best pun?

      but

6.1.20  5:33 pm   If you found out you were living in The Matrix what would you do

      make a tour guide, of the matrix

6.1.20  5:19 pm   why do you always type in lowercase?

      not always, but why do YOU

6.1.20  5:08 pm   5.27.20  2:24 am huh? isn't the 9 C#?

      i was assuming +9 means 'augmented 9' or 'sharp 9'. You may have assumed it means "add9", but if it's add 9, it really shouldn't say + because that is a symbol for augmented, and also, because it was Bm7, it also includes the 7, and "add9" usually means you add 9 without having the 7. where as if you wanted to keep the 7 it would be just Bm9. Also, possibly, this confusion could have been avoided by saying Bm7(#9). But according to my best reasoning, i determined that it was nearly 100% likely that the person meant aug9 or sharp9 and not 'add 9', based on all the charts i have seen throughout my life time

6.1.20  4:47 pm   i want to start a band. i have some friends that want to also. how do i do this

      i would recommend starting a band with someone besides friends. if you start a band with your friends, the friendship and hang out aspect will always be first priority, and the band will be second. where as if you start a band with brand new people, the band will always be the first priority and as an added bonus you will also make friends with the people in the band, while still not disrupting that priority. i am paraphrasing a famous piece of wisdom 'a friendship founded on business is much better than a business founded on friendship'

6.1.20  4:41 pm   is the earth flat

      no, but with enough dedication maybe you could flatten it

6.1.20  4:34 pm   5.30.20  1:09 am the game continues
       XI_I_
        _I_I_
          I  IO

      right. X has it, because the only defense for the X corner is O middle, which will not even get O a win unless X has a massive brain failure. so as we can see, there is an easy force win in this game, from move 1, for whoever gets move 1. which kind of makes the game largely flawed

6.1.20  12:59 pm   what are the divisibility rules for 7, 8, and 9?

      7 is divisible by nothing really. 8 is divisible by 2 and 4. and 9 is divisible by 3. and all of them are divisible by 1 and itself. and actually, all of them are divisible by anything if you are allowing the result to be a non-integer

6.1.20  12:27 pm   What is the difference between creativity and inspiration?

      i think they are the same

6.1.20  12:01 pm   have you ever thought about making a song about a spherical loaf of bread?

      no but that would be good illustrative device for a video

6.1.20  11:53 am   how do transition from your writing sound to an arrangement? do you ever just think "ah, the writing sound is actually the correct sound for this and i should just sing over it"?

     i've thought that many times, but for various reasons, it just never seems to work out that way

     i was writing something and accidentally changed my writing sound and it sounded really bad all of a sudden but then i realised that probably means that something else that would sound good, sounded bad to me before, because my writing sound. knowing this do you ever change your writing sound to see if different things sound better now? thanks

      very rarely

6.1.20  11:45 am   if the moon was made of cheese, would it be rotting?

      beyond that. it would have completely petrified by now
